welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nieuwegein, a charming city known for its beautiful canals, green spaces, and modern architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
